query.name: recalc_game.get_list_operation_rental_housing
query.comment: Получаем список сдаваемых квартир с сортировкой по цене

hibernate-mapping.query:
from OperationGame og
where og.game = :game and og.gameDate = :gameDate and :sd >= og.svd and og.fvd is null and og.statusOperation = ru.fedichkindenis.enums.StatusOperation.CONFIRM and og.typeOperation = ru.fedichkindenis.enums.TypeOperation.RENTAL_HOUSING
order by og.countRes

query.name: recalc_game.get_list_ppl_order_by_credit
query.comment: Список статистики колонистов отсортиованых по количеству кредитов

hibernate-mapping.query:
from StateResourcesPpl sp
join sp.ppl p
where sp.game = :game and sp.gameDate = :gameDate and p.stat = ru.fedichkindenis.enums.StatusPpl.IN_GAME
order by sp.credit desc

query.name: recalc_game.get_list_state_resources
query.comment: Список статистики ресурсов с сортировкой по игрокам

hibernate-mapping.query:
from StateResources sr
where sr.game = :game and sr.gameDate = :gameDate
order by sr.user.id

query.name: recalc_game.get_game_link_resources
query.comment: Возвращает на сущность связи игры, типа операции и ссылку на цепочку ресурсов

hibernate-mapping.query:
from GameLinkResources glr
where glr.game = :game and glr.typeOperation = :typeOperation
